formalpara.title: Figure 4. Diagram of genotype of reference hIn1 inversion strain
formalpara.para: The unc-75 and unc-101 mutations are carried on the normal LG I. The unc-54 mutation was induced secondarily on the inversion chromosome. Recombination is suppressed along the length of the inverted segment in heterozygotes (boundaries of suppression correspond to breakpoints). Terminal sequences are most likely not included in the inverted interval, as a deficiency of the ribosomal gene cluster (eDf24) to the right of unc-54 on normal LG I is apparently not balanced.
